bibl.title: Alexandria: Library of Dreams
bibl.note: Read 10 November 2000. - "About three types of dreams that have beguiled commentators ancient and modern: dreams about the size of the Bibliotheca Alexandrina; - dreams about placing the blame for its destruction; - and dreams about the consequences of its loss. There are some positive lessons as well."

bibl.title: Proceedings of the American Philosophical Society

bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Alexandria: Library of Dreams.

Read 10 November 2000. - "About three types of dreams that have beguiled commentators ancient and modern: dreams about the size of the Bibliotheca Alexandrina; - dreams about placing the blame for its destruction; - and dreams about the consequences of its loss. There are some positive lessons as well."
